body_html: I'm not going to get around to looking at this until the work week, but my plan is to do a binary comparison on the checkpoints and see where they diverge, and what kind of corruption is happening, and then check which particular part of the serialization code was writing out that part of the file.

body: I'm not going to get around to looking at this until the work week, but my plan is to do a binary comparison on the checkpoints and see where they diverge, and what kind of corruption is happening, and then check which particular part of the serialization code was writing out that part of the file.
